## CompilerProps.macros property

When provided it overrides the DEFAULT\_MACROS and are used when compiling the templates.

You can include the DEFAULT\_MACROS if you include them:

```ts
macros: {
   ...DEFAULT_MACROS,
   ...myMacros
}
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly macros?: MacroMap;
```
